title: Robert Mueller, Cardi B., Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Robert Mueller, Cardi B., Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Today opens up and Steve almost got on his own nerves.  In Ask Steve get the best travel advise on a budget.  Robert Mueller's conclusion will have you dumbfounded and more.  Cardi B. spends 80 racks on daughter Kulture's jewelry.  Sheryl Underwood stops by with a special announcement.  Miss Carla covers Real Housewives of Potomac and she talks about the NOLA trip and someone makes a crazy drunken confession.  Get the details in Reality Update.  J. Anthony Brown is thankful to all the well wishes and prayers from The Steve Harvey Nation.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve tells us about what can happen if we change our environment and more.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
